allow: Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\bin\psql" -U postgres -p 5432 -d petroverse_analytics -c "\d petroverse.fact_bdc_transactions" -h localhost)

Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\bin\psql" -U postgres -p 5432 -d petroverse_analytics -c "SELECT volume_liters, volume_mt, volume_liters/NULLIF(volume_mt,0) as liters_per_mt FROM petroverse.fact_bdc_transactions WHERE volume_mt > 0 LIMIT 10;" -h localhost)

Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\bin\psql" -U postgres -p 5432 -d petroverse_analytics -c "SELECT product_id, AVG(volume_liters/NULLIF(volume_mt,0)) as avg_liters_per_mt, COUNT(*) as count FROM petroverse.fact_bdc_transactions WHERE volume_mt > 0 GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 15;" -h localhost)

Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\bin\psql" -U postgres -p 5432 -d petroverse_analytics -c "SELECT p.product_name, AVG(f.volume_liters/NULLIF(f.volume_mt,0)) as liters_per_mt FROM petroverse.fact_bdc_transactions f JOIN petroverse.products p ON f.product_id = p.product_id WHERE f.volume_mt > 0 GROUP BY p.product_name ORDER BY p.product_name;" -h localhost)
Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\bin\psql" -U postgres -p 5432 -d petroverse_analytics -c "\d petroverse.supply_data" -h localhost)

Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\bin\psql" -U postgres -p 5432 -d petroverse_analytics -c "ALTER TABLE petroverse.supply_data ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS volume_liters NUMERIC(15,2), ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS volume_mt NUMERIC(15,6);" -h localhost)

Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\bin\psql" -U postgres -p 5432 -d petroverse_analytics -c "SELECT DISTINCT data_quality_score FROM petroverse.supply_data WHERE data_quality_score IS NOT NULL ORDER BY data_quality_score LIMIT 20;" -h localhost)

Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\bin\psql" -U postgres -p 5432 -d petroverse_analytics -c "SELECT data_quality_score, COUNT(*) as count FROM petroverse.supply_data WHERE data_quality_score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY data_quality_score ORDER BY data_quality_score;" -h localhost)
